Title: tupleModuloByNumber
Description: Returns a tuple of the moduli (remainders) of division operations of a tuple and a given divisor.
tuple_num: Tuple of numerator values. Tuple of numeric type.div: The divisor value. Numeric type.
Tuple of the remainders of division of tuple_num and div. Tuple of non-zero integer values.An error is thrown for division by zero.
